project_descr: Enhance inclusive growth for creation of an enabling environment for employment generation, and skills development, with a focus on youth and women

outputs.output_descr: Provide technical support to Government of SA (National Treasury, DTI, EDD) with the envisaged outcome of an efficient and effective public Service

The purpose of this OUTPUT is promote land access and rural development as a strategy to address poverty, unemployment and income inequality in rural areas in South Africa. It provides policy and strategic advise on key programmes and policis that will promote adequate access to land and rural development

The purpose of this OUTPUT is to support the ongoing government initiatives to reduce unemployment among the youth.  In consultation with stakeholders and other youth formations, in particular the National Youth Development Agency (NYDA), a thorough analysis of lessons learned during the past years from within the country and abroad will be conducted with a view to informing the continuous articulation of inclusive and sustainable strategies to create job opportunities for the youth by also tapping on the available skills base. This approach to youth employment will also be informed by a Natio
Develop a “White Paper on The Consolidation and  Repositioning of the  South African Public Service”
Review existing national policies, programmes, and institutional arrangements against international experiences and best practices on social protection

This OUTPUT aims to support Government initiative on eSkills for Capacity Building & Human Resource Development; eSkills for Business Development; eSkills for Improving Public Services & Strengthening Democratic Institutions; eSkills & Education Delivery; Researching & Evaluating eSkills; eSkills for Participation in Local Decision Making and eSkills for African Advancement & Enhancing International Cooperation.
